statements: UPDATE health_insurance_policy_updates SET policy_holder_name = 'John Doe', updated_on = '2022-04-15 10:30:00', amendment_reason = 'Address Change' WHERE policy_id = 123

UPDATE health_insurance_policy_updates SET term_changes = '{"deductible": 1000, "coverage": ["hospital", "surgery"]}', policy_holder_name = 'Jane Smith', updated_on = '2022-09-15', amendment_reason = 'Policy upgrade' WHERE policy_id = 202
